en.title: Mattermost 7.7 is here!
en.description: Mattermost v7.7 includes the general availability of [Calls](https://docs.mattermost.com/configure/calls-deployment.html) and [Mobile app v2](https://mattermost.com/blog/preparing-for-mobile-v2-0/), [Channel Message priority](https://docs.mattermost.com/channels/message-priority.html), [Playbook runs in existing channels](https://docs.mattermost.com/playbooks/work-with-playbooks.html#multiple-runs-in-a-channel), [Playbook task inbox](https://docs.mattermost.com/playbooks/work-with-tasks.html#task-inbox), [Board file attachments](https://docs.mattermost.com/boards/work-with-cards.html#attach-files), [sidebar drag and drop Boards sidebar](https://docs.mattermost.com/boards/navigate-boards.html#manage-boards-on-the-sidebar) and improved [Boards template picker](https://docs.mattermost.com/boards/work-with-boards.html#choose-a-board-template). [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/upgrade/upgrading-mattermost-server.html) only takes a few minutes.

en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Desktop App v5.2 includes a downloads dropdown for managing downloads and an improved onboarding screen for adding new servers. See [the changelog](https://docs.mattermost.com/install/desktop-app-changelog.html) for more details.

en.title: 2 Your Mattermost server version is unsupported. Upgrading is required
en.description: You are on an unsupported Mattermost server version and it’s time to upgrade! [Read here](https://mattermost.com/blog/why-to-upgrade-mattermost-server/?utm_source=inapp-self-hosted&utm_medium=popup&utm_campaign=notification-why-upgrade-blog&utm_id=nov-notifications&utm_content=notification-why-upgrade-blog) on how we have improved server performance for Mattermost users, as well as why upgrading your Mattermost server ensures that you’re getting the latest new features, security fixes, and bug fixes.
